item.description:
hi guys- this is the soonest Euchre we could host at our home since the last one. September weekends are just too busy for us, hopefully you guys can rejoin us in the autumn for some more fun.
Feel free to bring something- a snack and your favorite beverage if you'd like.
Looking forward to some more playing soon. Keep safe in this hurricane month!

see you in October!

group.name: The North of Boston Euchre Meetup

item.name: Euchre night
